p: This study focuses on N = 55 Italian cities that are provincial capitals. Sources of data are The Ministry of Health in Italy for epidemiological data ( Ministero della Salute, 2020), Legambiente (2019) for data of air pollution deriving from the Regional Agencies for Environmental Protection in Italy, il Meteo (2020) for data of weather trend in 2020 (February and March) based on information of meteorological stations of Italian province capitals, finally the Italian National Institute of Statistics for data of the density of population concerning cities under study ( ISTAT, 2020).
